client.poller

Class Poller.PollTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.TimerTask
      • client.poller.Poller.PollTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Enclosing class:
    Poller

    public class Poller.PollTask
extends java.util.TimerTask
    This class extends TimerTask. This will allow for Poller to be able to run RollTask() on regular intervals

    • Method Detail

      • setProxy

        public void setProxy(IProxy proxy)

      • poll

        public boolean poll()
        Goes through the Proxy to check for updates in the server's model. Executes updateModel() if model has changed.
        Returns:
        returns true if model was updated. False if model stayed the same.
        Pre-Conditions:
        When the model changes it must update the version number.
        Post-Conditions:
        The ClientFacade will hold an updated model.

      • updateModel

        public void updateModel(ClientModel newModel)
        Replaces the old model with the given new one.
        Parameters:
        newModel - the new model received from the server.

      • run

        public void run()
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Specified by:
        run in class java.util.TimerTask
